titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the use of automated telephone equipment to send unsolicited text messages, and for other purposes.
To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the use of automated telephone equipment to send unsolicited text messages, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This bill expands and modifies prohibitions on the use of automatic telephone dialing systems to include automated text messages and other functionalities.
